attributes.action: Please consider the set out ideas and interventions proposed.
attributes.background:
This bbc.co.uk  from April 6th report sums up the growing problem we face with stabbings. See article below
http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-43640475
In fewer than 100 days, 52 people have been killed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle knife crime.
